pullRequest.title: Fix translucent blocks not rendering properly when moved by pistons on fabulous
pullRequest.bodyText:
Fixes #6915.
This is only on fabulous settings and the vanilla blocks affected are any stained glass, honey, slime and ice.
The fix is simply checking for translucent and passing in translucent moving block instead

commit.message: fix translucent block not rendering properly when moving by piston

nodes.bodyText: This does not seem correct. This replaces every render type with TranslucentMovingBlock if the block can render in the Translucent render type, but I think it should only replace the Translucent render layer with TranslucentMovingBlock, or am I wrong?
